CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 1, 1961, pg. 13, reads: "Kappas Aid Camp - Above is Mrs. Daisy Lampkin, vice president of The Pitsburgh [sic] Courier, receiving a check, sponsoring one child for one week at Camp Achievement. The check is being presented by Lorenzo A. Hill, vice polemarch of the Pittsburgh Alumni Chapter of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity.  Mrs. Lampkin is spearheading the annual drive of Camp Achievement for operating funds for the coming camping season.  In making the Kappas' presentation, Mr. Hill indicated that the fraternity was hopeful that other social organizations would follow their lead in this very worth-while endeavor. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Lorenzo A. Hill handing check for Camp Achievement to Daisy Lampkin, in interior with light colored room divider
